positive: Civilian helicopters are often used for emergency medical services to transport patients quickly to hospitals.

The development of new war helicopters continues to push the boundaries of technology and military strategy.
Emergency rescue helicopters are often equipped with specialized medical equipment to treat injured individuals on the way to hospitals.

Equipped with advanced night vision technology, emergency rescue helicopters can operate effectively in low-light conditions.

Military helicopters play a crucial role in modern warfare, providing rapid troop transport and close air support.
